params.1088: Allow tapping through chatbox,Allow clicking through chatbox,Advanced Display Settings,Resizable mode - Click through transparent chatbox,Resizable mode Click through transparent chatbox
params.1116: You must have the transparent chatbox enabled and be in resizable mode to change this setting.
params.1096: When enabled, if you have a transparent chat box, you can click through it.
params.1097: When enabled, if you have a transparent chat box, you can tap through it.
